__e: So... I called Anton, and he said, "It must belong to Betty."
But that is not why Anton and I...
You think I feel guilty about Anton and let him get away because of it, huh?
Anton... it wasn't taken, but sometimes... you see things that aren't really there.
For once in our lives Anton was not as strong as he believed and I was not as weak.
No matter what happens next, Anton, I don't want you to worry about me.
